description: Our beautiful, spacious and eclectic home could be yours for the week or weekend! Located in Bushwick, there are many funky restaurants, bars and great neighborhood hangs such as Little Skips/Little Mo's, Bizarre, Forrest Point...Grocery just around the corner. Great location for transportation into the city - just a quick ride on the JMZ train. Nearby to the L train to get around Brooklyn. We also have a bike available for you to use if you would like! We love our home and we hope you enjoy it!
name: Our Funky Lovely Home
